active_incidents.title: Users may be having trouble loading Slack

notes.body: Users may be experiencing trouble loading their DMs, channels, and sidebar in Slack. We’re investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

active_incidents.title: Users are unable to post to the #general channel

notes.body: We’re still actively investigating this issue, but we don’t have any new information to share at this time. Thanks for sticking with us as we continue to work towards a fix.
We're currently investigating reports that some users are unable to post to the #general channel. We apologize for the disruption and will provide an update once we have more details to share.
